metadata.title: CVE-2020-8036 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
The tok2strbuf() function in tcpdump 4.10.0-PRE-GIT was used by the SOME/IPdissector in an unsafe way.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-8036` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpdump - 4.99.0-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpdump package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.99.0-2').
